messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Asteroids are big rocks in space. Now, NASA is looking for smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres wide or more.

People think there are about 25,000 of these asteroids. Until now, NASA found about 8,000. So, they still need to find 17,000.

In 2013, a small asteroid exploded over a city in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it hurt 1,200 people. The other asteroids are much bigger. They are a very serious danger if they come near Earth.
